data.title: Clara Eleanor Boardman
data.text:
Misc. Notes

Name Of “Clara Eleanor Broadman” from hand-drawn ‘Billing’ tree, prepared circa 1979, in Muriel Leo’s (nee Oliver, 1917-1998) collection.

Year and country of marriage from search on New Zealand BDM website in November 2018:

1915/5383. Bride: Clara Eleanor Boardmar. Groom: Thomas Edward Billing

[Brian of nzolivers notes different spelling for maiden name]

Full date of marriage of 30 December 1915 from further searching in November 2018 on BDM Search by incrementally changing the date range for the marriage.

Year and country of birth from search on New Zealand BDM website in November 2018:

1895/7193. Boardman, Clara Eleanor. Mother: Annie Elizabeth. Father: Frederick Obdill

[Brian of nzolivers notes different spelling for maiden name of “Boardman, and has accepted this as being correct]

Full date of birth of 5 June 1895 from further searching in November 2018 on BDM Search by incrementally changing the date range for the birth.

Year and country of death, from death search on New Zealand BDM website in November 2018:

1967/46414. Billing, Clara Eleanor, died age 72Y

Full date of death of 28 October 1967 from further searching in November 2018 on BDM Search by incrementally changing the date range for the death.

Buried Opunake Burial New Lawn plot 1491 on 31/10/1967 from South Taranaki Cemetery search in February 2019.
